page.title: 17RELIGION CRESSBROOK WARDLOW
page.content: The small Anglican Church at Cressbrook has only one service each month with an average attendance of approximately ten people. There is a small cemetery in a field near Cressbrook village. The small Anglican Church at Wardlow dedicated to The Good Shepherd has a service twice a month attended by approximately nine people. The Vicar of Tideswell gives pastoral care to the two communities. The Methodist Chapel at Cressbrook was closed for worship ten years ago and since then, the Methodists in the area go to Litton Chapel.
